text: I am surprised... This is the beginning of the journey, but it seems to me that thanks to Anna it will become simpler, less bumpy, and the views will reach the horizon... rather than the next corner behind which you don't know what awaits.
Very helpful. Engaged in conversations. Empathetic. I always leave the office charged with positive energy. I highly recommend.
The psychologist is nice, listens carefully. Gives advice and guidance. I recommend.
Anna is very nice, pleasant and empathetic.
Great doctor

I rarely give reviews, but this time I simply couldn't do otherwise. Anna helped me immensely, she is not only extremely professional but also punctual, and each visit lasts exactly as long as agreed at ZL. Already during the first meeting, she accurately discovered the true source of my problem. Anna is very pleasant, full of empathy, listens attentively and proposes healthy, supportive thinking patterns. She effectively helped me reprogram my negative attitude. Moreover, she has an amazing memory, she remembered the names of my husband, father, and brothers, which is truly impressive and speaks to her tremendous commitment. I wholeheartedly recommend Anna, she is an exceptional specialist and an amazing psychologist.
I highly recommend, just a few visits are enough to feel better. Very comfortable atmosphere and helpful exercises.

For several months, the doctor has been advising, explaining, and dispelling my doubts - she is a competent, engaged person with a vast amount of knowledge, which she brilliantly utilizes during consultations. She speaks in an open and very friendly manner. Importantly - she also knows how to listen to the patient. She is a professional! I warmly recommend!
Commitment at the highest level, professional approach to the situation.
Anna is very helpful and professional, I definitely recommend
full professionalism, pleasant Psychologist.
I feel understood and heard, I could be myself, I highly recommend Anna
I recommend, a very nice lady conducted an initial conversation with me, after which I was quickly scheduled for the next consultation
The doctor is punctual and very nice. Engaged in the conversation, provided guidance regarding further treatment for my daughter. I recommend
Everything explained super well. I am satisfied with the phone conversation.
I highly recommend. Professional contact, great support and understanding. Appropriate support already at the stage of first contact.
Over the phone, you can hear a nice voice and praise that I had taken the first step towards improving my mental health gave me more motivation and desire to try to do something in this direction.
Very nice and empathetic approach to the client, thank you!
I am satisfied with the conversation. The lady is very nice and understanding.
Everything is fine, a very nice lady with a soothing voice, very understanding and immediately understood where the problem lies
